title: Report Unplanned Outage to ISO
description: A gas-fired peaker plant unexpectedly trips offline. The operator must immediately report the outage to the ISO/RTO.

tasks.description: Identify the asset ID, the exact time of the outage, and the total MW capacity that is now offline.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers the critical outage information.

tasks.description: Determine the initial cause of the trip from the plant's control system (e.g., 'turbine over-speed').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the system's initial fault code.

tasks.description: Submit a formal outage report (e.g., a GADS report) to the ISO/RTO portal within the required timeframe (e.g., 15 minutes).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully files the outage report.
